description:
Conan, Ran, Kogoro are joined by Heiji and Kazuha visiting from Osaka at the Suzuki Museum. Suzuki Jirokichi has challenged Kaito Kid to steal the world`s largest conch pearl on display at the museum known as the Fairy Lip, boasting that the gemstone can be seen clearly from all angles. Meanwhile, Kid has already disguised himself among the riot police but is reluctant to act in the presence of two high school detectives and the brilliant Inspector Takaaki. However, just then, a woman claiming to be the real owner of the conch pearl appears...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kid contre Kômei: les lèvres prises pour cible (1re partie)
Kid vs. Komei: The Targeted Lips (Part 1)
キッドVS高明 狙われた唇 (前編)
키드 vs 코메이 목표가 된 입술 (전편)
